FuncDef: The option121 command configures the classless static route for the DHCP client. The undo option121 command deletes a configured classless static route. By default, no classless static route is configured.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies a destination IP address.
The value is in dotted decimal notation.

Specifies a mask length.
The value is an integer ranging from 0 to 32.

Specifies a gateway address.
The value is in dotted decimal notation.

ExtraInfo: The option121 command applies to only the DHCP server. The option121 command configures Option 121 that defines a classless static route allocated to a client.
